thread.title: Ground News - Confederate monument protection bill filed in Senate
thread.title_full: Ground News - Confederate monument protection bill filed in Senate

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Confederate monument protection bill filed in Senate
text:
Summary by Ground News Sen. Jonathan Martin's SB 1122 would impose penalties on local officials who removed historical monuments after July 1, 2024. Martin's bill is a companion to a similar House bill from Rep. Dean Black. Black's bill seems to have been the impetus for the decision of the Jacksonville Mayor to authorize the removal of the Jim Crow era monument this week. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Florida Politics Center High Factuality Confederate monument protection bill filed in Senate The House version was filed earlier this year, before Jacksonville removed its last Jim Crow era statue.
